short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you focus and get things done!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock your full potential with the Pomodoro Task Manager, the ultimate productivity tool designed to help you manage your time effectively!

     Customizable Timer: Set your work session length and break duration according to your preferences. Default settings are ideal for most tasks, but feel free to tweak them to fit your style!

     Task Management: Add, edit, and delete tasks easily, allowing you to track your to-do list and see what you’ve accomplished at the end of the day.

     Comprehensive Blocking: Effortlessly block any site or domain of your choice by simply adding it to your block list. Our extension supports full domains, including subdomains, ensuring you can prevent access to sites that disrupt your workflow.

     Daily Statistics: Keep a record of your productivity. Visualize completed work sessions and track time spent on tasks to identify your peak performance times.

     Simple and User-Friendly Interface: With a clean and minimalist design, our app is easy to navigate, ensuring that you can focus on what matters most—getting work done!

     Notifications: Receive alerts when it's time to take a break or start your next session, helping you stick to your productivity plan without constantly checking the clock.
